name: Operation Apex
description: Use virtual reality to uncover the secrets of the big blue in an atmospheric deep sea dive. As you bear witness to an underwater marvel, your mission becomes clear.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
